definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: But in the last 8 weeks - yes. I had a hepatitis A booster .
sentences.chinese: 但是在过去的8个月，我用过甲型肝炎辅助药剂。

sentences.english: The teen was hospitalized and tested positive for hepatitis A, a highly contagious liver infection.
sentences.chinese: 男孩住院后，甲型肝炎检测呈阳性。

sentences.english: Certain sex practices can also spread HAV.
sentences.chinese: 某些性行为也能够传播甲型肝炎病毒。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the best treatment of the Chinese medicine for altitude hepatitis A.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中医中药治疗高原地区甲型肝炎的最佳方法。

sentences.english: Several hepatitis A vaccines are available internationally.
sentences.chinese: 国际上有几种甲型肝炎疫苗。

sentences.english: Worldwide, HAV infections account for an estimated 1.4 million cases annually.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，每年世界各地甲型肝炎感染者有140万例。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the immune dose of Aluminium adjuvant absorbed inactivated HAV vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价佐剂吸附甲型肝炎成品疫苗有效免疫剂量。

sentences.english: An estimated 1.4 million cases of hepatitis A occur annually.
sentences.chinese: 每年估计有140万甲型肝炎新发病例。

pinyin: gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4
